handoff_data.summary: Completed email design for Kupibilet campaign "Осень в Таиланде" with MJML template, optimized imagery, and full performance review. Responsive, vibrant, family-friendly, inspiring visual. CTA and pricing data real. WCAG/brand/dark mode/desktop-mobile compliant. Packaged for QA handoff.
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use MJML template and assets for thorough email testing in key clients, mobile and dark mode validation.
recommendations: Test display in Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail across mobile and desktop devices
Pay special attention to color contrast and button accessibility
Ensure brand green (#4BFF7E) and orange (#FF6240) match original
Review all lifestyle and hero images for autumn/family vibe
Validate that pricing and CTA blocks attract attention
